person.persName: Cortez R. Priest (Henderson co. farm hand/10th CS Cav)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farm hand and Confederate soldier. Kentucky native. Married Margaret M. E. Jones Priest in Henderson County in 1852. Enlisted as a Private in the 10th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (Johnson's) (C.S.A.) on August 23, 1862. Deserted and was captured by Union forces on July 17, 1863 in Union County, Kentucky. Transferred from the Military Prison in Louisville, Kentucky, to Camp Chase, Ohio, on September 17, 1863. Transferred to Rock Island Barracks, Illinois, on January 17, 1864. Released on February 2, 1864, after taking the oath of allegiance at Rock Island.
